# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.wav$
^\.github/
\.gitignore$
\.gitattributes$
\.sln$
\.csproj$
\.editorconfig$
\.runsettings$
^\.vscode/
\.props$
(?:^|/)(?i)README
\.vdproj$
\.config$
\.json$
